## hpr0905 :: Akranis: How I got into Linux 

 
A 5 minute show about how I came to know Linux and the distribution I use today.


You can find my modified bashpodder script here: https://pastebin.com/zGtMRA9m


And you can find the original script here: https://lincgeek.org/bashpodder/


hexagenic@gmail.com
